name: 'Red Back' nail sets
description: 24 matte black nails with glossy animal print and a classy red 'sole', much like a certain brand of shoe that graces the celebrity red carpets...and our shoe cupboards!

name: 'Geometric' nail set
description:
Triangles. Orderly on their own, yet slightly disorganised when they are placed together.  Awesome on the nail.

24 false nails, with a pale pink nail polish background.

name: 'Rhino' nail set
description:
There have been a lot of studs floating around of late. Studs on hats, jackets, belts, shoes... If you can't get enough of these beautiful things, why not wear them on your fingers too?

This set comprises of 24 nails, some studded, some plain and some matte with glossy half moons.

Watch out now - those spikes are tough, much like the person wearing them.

name: 'Princessa' nail set
description:
Pink, polka dots, sparkles and gold. 

A 'Kawaii' (cute) set of 24 nails, embellished with acrylic roses, 'pearls', rhinestones and gold coloured studs.

The acrylic roses were created on the nail, not pre-made and stuck on.

name: Custom nail sets
description:
Seen a nail design you want replicated? 

Do you have a favourite pattern you want to wear on your fingers? Starting at a price of £25, I can create a personalised set of nails for you. 

The design can either be 24 short, square nails or 20 long, oval nails.

Contact me by email and we can discuss your specifications. 

A non-refundable deposit of £10 will be required, but this will go towards the final price of the nail sets. 

As the composition of these nails depend on your requirements and contact with me, please allow at least 14 days for completion after you have confirmed your requirements. Be advised that it may not actually take this long to paint the nails, but if I need to source a specific item, I will need time to do so. 

Please also be aware that the price will vary, depending on the level of complication of the design.

Please add any pictures or links to designs that you are interested in.
